response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value, much like what you've come to expect from us. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth every penny of its $10,000 value to you. Considering its quality and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I kindly propose an offer of $9,500 for this product. This represents a fantastic opportunity for you to secure such a valuable asset at a slightly discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
